perturbation.original_text: Smith agrees to cooperate in good faith with TDA in connection with TDA's exercise of the Rights in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Smith agrees to cooperate in good faith with TDA in connection with TDA's exercise of the Privileges in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Rights' is a defined term in Section 2.1. Replacing it with 'Privileges,' which is undefined, creates ambiguity and confusion about what Smith is obligated to cooperate with. This introduces uncertainty in enforcement as it is unclear if 'Privileges' are equivalent to 'Rights'.

perturbation.original_text: All right, title and interest in and to TDA's Golf Instruction Related Products shall be and remain the absolute property of TDA forever (it being understood that after the Term TDA may continue to manufacture, promote, sell and/or distribute its other golf instruction related interactive entertainment sports products which are separate and distinct from the Golf Instruction Related Products incorporating Smith's Likeness on the packaging without being subject to any of the limitations or restriction herein, provided that the Rights are not (directly or indirectly) utilized by or incorporated in such other golf instruction related interactive sports products.
perturbation.changed_text: All right, title and interest in and to TDA's Golf Instruction Related Products shall be and remain the absolute property of TDA forever (it being understood that after the Term TDA may continue to manufacture, promote, sell and/or distribute its other golf instruction related interactive entertainment sports products which are separate and distinct from the Golf Instruction Related Products incorporating Smith's Likeness on the packaging without being subject to any of the limitations or restriction herein, provided that the Likenesses are not (directly or indirectly) utilized by or incorporated in such other golf instruction related interactive sports products.
perturbation.explanation: The agreement uses 'Rights' (defined in Section 2.1) regarding publicity and use of Smith's likeness. By substituting 'Rights' with 'Likenesses', the scope of permitted activities after the agreement's term becomes unclear. 'Likenesses' implies only the image itself is restricted, not broader promotional activities tied to Smith, potentially conflicting with the original intent and creating an enforcement gap.

perturbation.original_text: The term of this Agreement (the "Term") shall commence on the Effective Date and terminate at the end of the Exclusivity Period (i.e., a three (3) year period commencing on the Effective Date).
perturbation.changed_text: The term of this Agreement (the "Duration") shall commence on the Effective Date and terminate at the end of the Exclusivity Period (i.e., a three (3) year period commencing on the Effective Date).
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Term' to 'Duration' in the definition, while still referencing the 'Exclusivity Period' which is defined in relation to the 'Term,' creates confusion. Throughout the document, 'Term' is used extensively. Using 'Duration' in the definition while maintaining 'Term' elsewhere creates uncertainty as to which time period is being referenced, especially when calculating royalties or post-term sales rights. Does 'Exclusivity Period' end the 'Duration' or the 'Term'?
